name: Mundipharma International Limited
goal:
Mundipharma and its in network of dependent associated companies are privately owned companies and joint ventures covering the world's pharmaceutical markets.
These companies are committed to bringing to patients the benefits of significant new treatment options.

Mundipharma works with patients, policy-makers at national and EU level, and payers to drive further improvements in treatments across the addiction ecosystem.
interests: Communication, Home Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: The network of Mundipharma International Limited associated companies is developing a portfolio of medicines for people living with addiction. Mundipharma International recently responded to the European Commission?s consultation on EU Drugs Strategy.
